comments: the guy is just so negative. students arent as good as they used to be. there are no jobs in accounting anymore. the ruels are no good anymore. do some more real problems in class.

school_name: Seneca College of Applied Arts and Technology-ALL
comments: He\'s not helpful, ambiguous and doesn\'t teach. You\'re probably better off going to a real university.

school_name: Seneca College of Applied Arts and Technology-ALL
comments: Not a good teacher! He is a very nice person but isn\'t good at teaching. Makes things more complicated then they are. Doesn\'t do enough examples in class. And he\'s review for the midterms and final consists of.. It will cover chapter 1, 2 and ..that\'s the review. You can do well in this class still as long as you study the book alone.

school_name: Seneca College of Applied Arts and Technology-ALL
comments: A nice and funny person, but many people relied on the textbook rather than his classes. He\'s an easy marker and does try to accommodate students for those who are concerned. He is usually not in his office and so to speak to him privately, you\'d have to either set up an appointment or talk to him after class.

school_name: Seneca College of Applied Arts and Technology-ALL
comments: If you can, please stay away from this teacher. I got 90\'s and 80\'s on all my courses except this one. In ACCT 230 at Humber College I did my homework, studied my ass off and still failed. He was not helpful with the homework, never explained the homework or the answers to the tests. school_name: Seneca College of Applied Arts and Technology-ALL
comments: To get a good mark you have to attend his classes , he is nice but not a good marker .And worse of all the is little correlation between your performance and your grade if you do not attend class. i will not suggest him as my first 5 choices and i just took him this summer 2011

school_name: Seneca College of Applied Arts and Technology-ALL
comments: He is a joker if you really understand him. Easy marker for quizzes. Watch out for his exams. Very helpful.

school_name: Seneca College of Applied Arts and Technology-ALL
comments: He is a nice professor. provide many anwsers for homework. It realy help to understand the material. He is a fair mark teacher.

school_name: Seneca College of Applied Arts and Technology-ALL
comments: If you have a choice, stay away from this prof. like for heaven\'s sake, even the powerpoint slides he uses are not made by him! he uses the ones made by the publishers!

school_name: Seneca College of Applied Arts and Technology-ALL
comments: He is a talking textbook!!! but the textbook is easier and more interesting. He is boring, the only good thing he is not a hard marker.

school_name: Seneca College of Applied Arts and Technology-ALL
comments: I had to drop the course because i literally, LITERALLY!! fell asleep in every single class. Incomprehensible! He explains everything as if you\'ve been doing accounting for years. Word to Chazan, in your class i learned the difference between a debit and credit. Thank you.

school_name: Seneca College of Applied Arts and Technology-ALL
comments: Worst person in the educational institution by far, especially for accounting. I would have picked someone better looking and more interesting-sounding to read the Powerpoint slides.
